title: Best URF Champion?
body:
out of all the magical op champions out there, who do you personally think is the best?
personally i believe fizz is a amazing champion, he's E makes him invulnerable and it has a 2 second cd when maxed, he's ult is a 20 second cd with means he can gobble up people in a second, and he's Q is on like a 1 second cd maxed out. he's my bby in URF mode.

replies.body: Another one, Full AP Fiora against anyone reliant on auto attacks. YOU CALL THAT A COUNTER ATTACK JAX? *Riposte explosion*
that does sound gross, but you would never know if your opponent is auto attack based, could work for and against you. but sounds like a pretty scummy thing to do xD
Vlad is insane. All those heals, all that damage.
that fact that vlad can stay in pool form the whole game pretty much makes him gross!!! to strong of a champion!
no mention of eve?  ludens echo is probably the most op item on her. and you simply cant run away from her either, she's  got a slow and a speed up.

> [{quoted}](name=Darth R2,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A6TgnKPK,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-04-08T02:56:17.178+0000)
>
> no mention of eve?  ludens echo is probably the most op item on her. and you simply cant run away from her either, she's  got a slow and a speed up.

Bingo. Buffed in 5.7. Although there is still one more champion that is more OP than all of that list that hasn't been mentioned ;)
would that champion be yorick? versed one and he was pretty gross
Vladimir, build full hp, spend all game in pool dealing amage based off bonus hp, while healing and doing aoe damage, poll has like no cooldown
this is so true, but as fizz i bursted the vlad down in that split 1millisecond between each pool, but it was hard, vlad is very very very strong, surprised not many people play him as much.
I'm really enjoying playing Jinx, Lux and Ahri. Ahri takes a huge dump on anybody when she can throw out a charm every 3-4 seconds, and at rank 2 her Q can be shot as soon as it returns.
yes!!! i must agree ahri is actually that annoying to verse, that charm and q is practically unstoppable :c
L4NT3NCY's fizz would wreck in our internal playtests, so that'd be my vote as well!
fizz is so strong yet people can't play him well enough in the games i play and so he doesn't get banned as often, but he's starting to get banned more now.. :c
Malzahar. Go AD spam spells and watch your voidlings murder turrets.
as stated in the comment below i will try it, can't wait though, sounds way to strong!! xD
{{champion:238}}
fizz can dodge most abilities but zed is a pain in the ass

Fizz CAN dodge most abilities this is true. But it honestly wouldn't matter as Zed's E basically has no cooldown and his Shurikens are on like a second. Although I have played Fizz in URF and both were incredibly strong. I'd say PERSONALLY it's a tie between the two of them
yeah its a tie, depending on the person playing them, but personally i prefer fizz cause when he's E is maxed you have like no chance of dying if you play safe and well cause of its like 1.6 cd
Diana, Brand or Karma
typical champions that were op
Orianna, she fucks everyone, slow start but if you're quick you can just decimate everyone.
this is so true, unless you verse a ezreal or a sivir, ez can jump out of ult and sivir can spell shield, but yes ori is so strong

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A6TgnKPK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-05T14:17:33.661+0000)
>
> this is so true, unless you verse a ezreal or a sivir, ez can jump out of ult and sivir can spell shield, but yes ori is so strong

Her q has a 0.7s cooldown, who cares if they jump out, just follow them.
for me its a 0.6 cooldown, nah but we both agree orianna is strong as a MOFO
why would you call ori that ;-;
i do as i please (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻

Half these champs are shit.

{{champion:32}} for the win.
thats your opinion but most of the champions here are reasonable the same in how op they are

Jayce :P

AP Poke is too mainstream...
jayce does well

I have been playing AD Malz like Hotshotgg did in the exabition game.  So much push.. hold people down whille your minions beat on them.. constant ability spam. SIlences are really really strong in URF.
sounds like fun ill give it a geez later on :D
The best URF champion isn't even on the list... {{champion:37}} is broken as hell.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A6TgnKPK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-06T04:22:11.779+0000)
>
> The best URF champion isn't even on the list... {{champion:37}} is broken as hell.

This. Well there's actually another one, but secret :P
i could only put in 10 different options
Personally I'm liking Kayle a lot. Strong slow that can be applied almost constantly, powerful 2-3 second heal with built in speed boost, 20 second cooldown invulnerability (at rank one).
you could say that about any champion, then she gets instabursted by a shaco or kited and killed by an ez.............
I've been handling Ez and Shaco pretty well though. Haven't been able to do it every encounter but I can handle them.
